name: Nissan Magnite
description: The price of Nissan Magnite, a 5 seater Compact SUV, ranges from Rs. 6.00  - 11.11 Lakh. It is available in 29 variants, with an engine of 999 cc and a choice of 2 transmissions: Manual and Automatic. Magnite has an NCAP rating of 4 stars and comes with 2 airbags. Nissan Magnite has a ground clearance of 205 mm  and is available in 8 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 17.4 to 19.7 kmpl for Magnite.
